1607120.name: The Mystery of Caketropolis Soundtrack
1607120.description:
The Mystery of Caketropolis Soundtrack features all 26 tracks composed exclusively for The Mystery of Caketropolis, totaling over an hour of stunning, original music. This soundtrack includes both standard and high-fidelity versions of each track, each formatted for stand-alone listening.

As an added thank you for your support, you'll also get access to a bonus art pack alongside the soundtrack that displays art assets from the game as crisp high-resolution images. This art pack includes:

  • 45+ hand-drawn illustrations featured in the game's cutscenes (2208x1248px).
  • 25 achievement icons (256x256px).

Please note: This bonus art can be accessed by browsing the local files for The Mystery of Caketropolis Soundtrack.
